metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5976 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the zzip_mem_entry_extra_block function in memdisk.c in zziplib 0.13.62, 0.13.61, 0.13.60, 0.13.59, 0.13.58, 0.13.57, 0.13.56 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted ZIP file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5976` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzzip-0-13 - 0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.1
zziplib-bin - 0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zziplib package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.1').
